---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
time <- read.csv("Time.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = time, aes(x = length)) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(y = Med_Quick, color = "Medians of QuickSelect")) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(y = Med_Med, color = "Medians of MedianSelect")) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(y = Med_Heap, color = "Medians of HeapSelect")) +
  labs(y = "Execution time") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
